item.title: Flux = Rad, or how I learned to stop worrying and love the fact I don’t have time
item.description: Over the last few months, between work and family time, I have come to the inescapable conclusion that there are not enough hours in a day. And so it goes… The Great Experiment: This began when I saw an inspirational article documenting a developer’s 500 day commit streak. At any given time, I always have a laundry list of ideas I’d like to implement and technologies I’d like to experiment with.
